name: Grey Guy's Red Zone
description:
GREY GUY'S RED ZONE is a game made in clickteam fusion 2.5 for the Mix And Game Jame 2020

It was pretty rushed tbh and it's pretty crappy but I learned a lot while making it and that's the important part!

Make sure to check out the other games in the jam and #STAY_SAFE

Genres : Horror X Platformer
